SELECT ITM_SEQ as "seq", ITM_NAME as "name", ITM_DESC as "desc", ITM_CONTENT as "content", ITM_SNAPSHT as "snapsht", ITM_WRDATE as "wrDate", ITM_DIRTURL as "dirtURL", ITM_ISDIRT as "dirt", ITM_HITS as "hit" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_ITEMS WHERE ITM_SEQ = #{seq}
